fields.name: Paid and subsistence work, men (UNSD (2016))
fields.description:
Average time spent in paid work in a 24 hour period. 

Paid work refers to employment; subsistence work refers to own-use production of goods.

fields.name: Unpaid domestic, care and volunteer work, men (UNSD (2016))
fields.description: Average time spent in unpaid domestic, care, and volunteer work in a 24 hour period.
